Replace.Text: The time has not yet come, and perhaps we need a little deeper understanding.
Friends, why don't you have a drink with me?
The people of Azure will protect this friendship with their lives.
Hey, it seems that I still have a lot of room for improvement.
Azure warriors are always ready to die for their faith!
Stand ready to be slaughtered, you savages who wreak havoc on the world.
Your envoys have arrived, and we will entertain them with the most sublime azure courtesy.
The time has not yet come, and perhaps we need a little deeper understanding.
Hope your country can accept our envoy, we have brought your country's favorite cultural books.
What you have done is disrespectful and shameless, I hope you will correct it.
Hello, I am the warrior of Azure-Sea King, I hope we will have a pleasant exchange in the future.
Welcome to the blue city, we have prepared a lot of delicacies to reward you.
Thank you for giving us an opportunity to study your country's culture.
The capital of Azure is Blue Fantasy, I wonder if we can reach the capital of your country.
We are ashamed of your profound cultural heritage, your lofty beliefs, and your great warriors.
It is always good to read more books, and the future of your country still needs to be figured out gradually.
Friends, we join hands, and we will eventually go to the deep ocean of stars.
Your behavior is too transgressive. We have provided simple accommodation for your fighters, and we hope that you can let the fighters outside go back to their hometowns.
Although I am gone, the blue will never die.
If you and I communicate with each other, the future will be more promising.
Mutual respect is the basis of cooperation, I do not see your respect.

Azure's special building: Cultural Study Room. Provide 2 points of [ICON_Housing] housing, 2 points of [ICON_Amenities] amenity, +3 [ICON_Culture] culture value, +3 [ICON_Faith] belief value, and provide 1 point [ICON_GreatArtist] great artist points and 2 art exhibition rooms, +2% [ICON_Culture] culture value of the city where the building is built at the same time.

Azure's special building: Cultural Study Room. Provide 2 points of [ICON_Housing] housing, 2 points of [ICON_Amenities] amenity, +3 [ICON_Culture] culture value, +3 [ICON_Faith] belief value, and provide 1 point [ICON_GreatArtist] great artist points and 2 art exhibition rooms, +2% [ICON_Culture] culture value of the city where the building is built at the same time.
The Azure unique unit that replaces the Scout. Has faster [ICON_Movement] movement and lower [ICON_Strength] combat strength. Unit experience gain increased by 50%.
The Azure unique unit that replaces the Scout. Has faster [ICON_Movement] movement and lower [ICON_Strength] combat strength. Unit experience gain increased by 50%.

Azure's unique naval unit: the Black-Eyed Crocodile. The initial level is level two, which can be purchased with Faith, has faster [ICON_Movement] movement and higher [ICON_Strength] combat power, and a new unit advancement tree. Every time a unit is killed, it will permanently +1 [ICON_Strength] combat power, and the unit experience gain will increase by 50%.

Azure's unique naval unit: the Black-Eyed Crocodile. The initial level is level two, which can be purchased with Faith, has faster [ICON_Movement] movement and higher [ICON_Strength] combat power, and a new unit advancement tree. Every time a unit is killed, it will permanently +1 [ICON_Strength] combat power, and the unit experience gain will increase by 50%.

Azure's newly established cities will have larger land areas. Celeste's special zone provides two additional standard adjacency bonuses when adjacent to other zones. At the beginning of the game, Celeste possesses the "navigation" technology.

Azure's newly established cities will have larger land areas. Celeste's special zone provides two additional standard adjacency bonuses when adjacent to other zones. At the beginning of the game, Celeste possesses the "navigation" technology.

Azure Featured Area: Advance to the Harbor. Alternative port, lower construction cost, lower loss from plunder, +2 [ICON_GreatAdmiral] Naval Admiral points per round, increased output of citizens' workplaces, increased output of commercial routes passing through this area, and special projects can be carried out : Sea of ​​stars.

Azure Featured Area: Advance to the Harbor. Alternative port, lower construction cost, lower loss from plunder, +2 [ICON_GreatAdmiral] Naval Admiral points per round, increased output of citizens' workplaces, increased output of commercial routes passing through this area, and special projects can be carried out : Sea of ​​stars.

You are the most elite warrior of the Azure Clan, the wise Azure Warrior—King of the Sea. All difficulties will become the stepping stones for you to move forward along the way. Don’t forget the glorious glory of the past, and set foot on the Avenue of Stars paved by the noble culture of the warriors. , spread the blue faith throughout the deep and quiet sea of ​​stars!

A city under the leadership of Neptune provides a 25% [ICON_Production] productivity bonus when establishing an area. Each citizen in the city can provide an additional +1 [ICON_Culture] culture value and +1 [ICON_Faith] faith value. In addition, combat units After death, it will get [ICON_Faith] belief value based on the unit's [ICON_Strength] combat power, and after killing other units, it will restore 10 [ICON_Damaged] health points.

A city under the leadership of Neptune provides a 25% [ICON_Production] productivity bonus when establishing an area. Each citizen in the city can provide an additional +1 [ICON_Culture] culture value and +1 [ICON_Faith] faith value. In addition, combat units After death, it will get [ICON_Faith] belief value based on the unit's [ICON_Strength] combat power, and after killing other units, it will restore 10 [ICON_Damaged] health points.
Our goal is no longer this piece of blue, but the deep and quiet sea of ​​stars! [NEWLINE] ———Sea King
Celeste's featured units gain experience by 50%.

Azure special project, provide [ICON_Gold] gold coin, [ICON_Faith] faith value, [ICON_Culture] culture value every round, provide [ICON_GreatArtist] great artist and [ICON_GreatAdmiral] naval commander points after completion.

The black-eyed alligators sang songs of faith. Killing a unit will give it 100% [ICON_Strength] combat strength [ICON_Faith] Faith value output. When a unit has this skill, the skill effect will be applied to all combat units of this civilization until the unit with this skill dies.
{1_Amount} [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when adjacent to the enemy Black-Eyed Crocodile
Azure likes those civilizations with high culture, high faith, and always have a large standing army, on the contrary, she hates them extremely.
(Neptune thinks your civilization output is very high, he likes to communicate with cultural people)
(Neptune thinks that your civilization's cultural output is very low, and civilization without culture will eventually fall to the world)
(Neptune believes that your civilization belief output is very high, only those who have faith can lead civilization forward)
(Neptune thinks that the output of your civilization's beliefs is very low, and civilizations without beliefs are a bunch of mobs)
(Neptune thinks that your civilized standing army is sufficient, and appreciates the civilization that holds the truth in its hands)
(Sea King thinks that your civilization has almost no standing army, and he is considering whether to destroy you)
+{1_num} [ICON_Gold] gold coins if close to the advancing harbor area.
